intro: Distemon kunzei, commonly known as the silverleaf daisy, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It is characterized by its silvery-gray foliage and showy yellow flowers with white centers. The plant belongs to the Asteraceae family, which includes daisies, sunflowers, and other composite flowers. Distemon kunzei typically grows in dry, rocky soils and thrives in full sun. It is often cultivated as an ornamental plant for its attractive appearance and drought tolerance.
